title: 將軍澳連儂牆遇襲女記者已經痊癒復工！

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/mpwculture/posts/2975758652438958?__tn__=H-R

希望大家努力下去煲底見！

泛民主派及一眾素人於區議會選舉報捷，以民意向港共政府表示，香港人定必站於抗爭者一方，直至達成五大訴求，光復香港。

面對失去認受性的制度及政權，選票只是卑微的表態方法之一。縱使區議會重光，仍遠遠未能觸及民怨之根本—立法會的功能組別及由中共直接委任特首。若不解決上述問題，任憑你取得更多區議會議席，暴政依舊橫行，黑警亦同樣逍遙法外。

香港人定必為亡魂抗爭到底，也懇請你們繼續以各種方式支援香港，包括落實香港人權與民主法案，協助我們抗衡邪惡的中共政權。

The Pro-democracy camp and nameless rookies have won a landslide victory in District Council Election on 24 Nov, the public has conveyed a clear message to the puppet government that Hong Kongers will always stand with the protesters, until five demands are all met and Hong Kong is liberated.

Considering a political system and a government which have completely lost their legitimacy, voting is only one way to vocalize, a subdued way. Although the District Council has changed hands, the root of our discontent – non-elected functional groups in the Legislative Council and the direct appointment of the Chief Executive by the CCP – has yet to be handled. However, many seats our side takes in the District Council, as long as the rotten root is there, the tyranny will not be taken down and the dirty cops will not be brought to book.

While Hong Kongers will persevere – for all the souls we have lost – the support from the world will be essential, including the implementation of the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act, to confront the monstrous CCP in joint effort.
